kitty.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the money that people have collected for a particular purpose
kitty.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: How much money is there left in the kitty?
kitty.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the money that the winner of a game of cards receives
kitty.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a word for a cat, used especially by children
kitty.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: an amount of money that has been gathered and is available for several people, organizations etc to use
kitty.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The Dutch pay more per capita than any other country into the collective EU kitty.
